I'm rating this game with 250 hours and as a Rank 1 Killer + Rank 4 Survivor
[hr][/hr]

[h1] Why I would recommend this game [/h1]

[list]
    [*] Fun solo AND with friends
    [*] Updates
    [*] Licenses
[/list]

[b] Fun solo AND with friends [/b]
[list]
    [*] The core idea of the game is a 1 vs 4 match where there are 4 survivors trying to repair 5 generators while a single killer tries to hook every one of the survivors 3 times and kill them. This means that you can enjoy the game with friends as survivors or play solo as a killer. Every killer also offers his own special ability and playstyle which makes them all very unique and fun in their own way.
[/list]

[b] Updates [/b]
[list]
    [*] Huge advantage playing the biggest game in it's genre is that there is still constant support from the devs. A new chapter which introduces new characters comes out every 3 months. And there are also game patches and balance fixes coming out everytime they're needed.
    [*] Just a sidenote. You will probably see a lot of people on social media shitting on the devs for ruining the game but even though a I agree to an extent I think you can notice that 99% of those people bitch about everything that happens in the game, even if it's for the good... so just take it with a grain of salt.
[/list]

[b] Licenses [/b]
[list]
    [*] Big plus this game offers over other games in it's genre is the amount of licensed killers from your favorite horror movies. If you want to play as Michael Myers... you can. Freddy Krueger? YOU CAN. You can also play as some of the iconic survivors from the movies. Take your pick. The devs are constantly looking for new licenses to implement into the game and if you don't care about licensed characters there are plenty of original killers and survivors you can play as.
[/list]

[hr][/hr]

[h1] Why I would NOT recommend this game [/h1]

[list]
    [*] The GRIND
    [*] Toxicity
    [*] Lack of variety
[/list]

[b] The GRIND [/b]
[list]
    [*] This game requires a lot... and I mean A LOT of time commitment if you want to get all the stuff you need or want. You're essentially gonna have to spend hours on hours grinding Blood Points (main ingame currency) to upgrade characters so you can unlock their Teachable Perks for other characters. So if you want to take this game seriously, you have to expect investing some time into unlocking everything you need for your desired perk build.
[/list]

[b] Toxicity [/b]
[list]
    [*] Players tend to be pretty toxic in this game. It's not as bad as most people will tell you but if you're playing survivor you'll meet a camping or tunneling killer every now and then, and if you're playing killer then expect a lot of t-bagging and flashlight clicking (especially if you're under-performing and they feel confident against you).
[/list]

[b] Lack of variety [/b]
[list]
    [*] This point is kind of related to "The GRIND" part of my review. The game itself offers only 1 gamemode. 1 Killer vs 4 Survivors. Except for a few event items, like fire crackers, you're not gonna catch a break from the monotone "repair 5 generators and open the gate" 15 minutes of despair. This gamemode is fun in itself but can get very boring if you grind out the game a lot.
[/list]

[hr][/hr]

[h1] Conclusion [/h1]

[list]
    [*] In conclusion if you like the core idea of the game I would recommend it to you. The game is fun and even after almost 300 hours I'm not bored of the single gamemode and still have a lot to learn. There is a problem with the developers not doing their best with this game but I personally don't think it's so bad that the game would be unplayable.
[/list]

Моя первая любимая игра в подобном жанре. Узнал о ней с момента её выхода летом 2016 года, но получилось поиграть самому только сейчас. Игра сразу же захватывала своей жуткой атмосферой, мрачными картами, страшными маньяками и главное целью - выжить любой ценой, не попадаясь безжалостному убийце и заведя все генераторы, открыв ворота к спасению, ведь "Смерть - это не выход". Сейчас же игра не стоит на месте и разработчики активно над ней работают, добавляя всё новые и новые главы. Единственное, что атмосфера игры понемногу падает и она уже не настолько пугает. Надеюсь, дальше всё будет лишь ещё интереснее и создатели, возможно, как-то разнообразят игру. А в целом, крайне рекомендую данную игру всем любителям сурвайвл-хорроров, ну или просто хорроров.

Absolutely recommend! Good fun with mates, random people you name it. Extremely unique style of game and the rounds play out interestingly. An amazing element of horror that really keeps it fresh. You're basically mindless if you do not choose to get this game.

Habe das Spiel nach 2 Jahren wieder ausprobiert, meine 10Games gemacht und kann leider nur sagen, dass das Spiel mitlerweile total unbalanced ist.

1. Haken können nicht mehr dauerhaft sabotiert werden 
2. nachdem der Ausgang offen ist hat man ein Zeitlimit wo man fliehen MUSS
3. Killer, besonders die neuen werden immer stärker, alte werden auch nachgebufft(Geist z.B kann viiiiiel schneller zuschlagen als früher und die Ankündigung (Glocke) bringt nichts mehr, weil er währenddessen schon zuschlagen kann.)
4. mitlerweile gibt mindestens 3mal so viele Opferhaken wie vorher.

und das witzige überlebende wurden sogar genervt.
es gibt kaum noch barrikaden zum umwerfen, oder Fenster zum durchqueren.

also als Fazit ist das Spiel nurnoch als Killer oder mit einer 5er Freundesgruppe spielenswert.

Schade das Spiel hatte sehr viel Potenzial gehabt.
